1.0.0.name: connect20/latest_news_notifier
1.0.0.description: Latest News Notifier is an awesome Module which allows you to display your latest news title with a smooth fading effect. Latest News Notifier provides a simple way to present news on your website, one at a time, through Jquery effect.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
